name: Lost in Halloween
description:
Follow Phoebe and Benny on their trick or treating adventures as they fight off bullies to protect their candy!

Play as Phoebe and hurl candy corn at neighborhood bullies trying to take your candy. Play through 6 levels featuring 100% original animations and soundtrack!

Instructions 

- Click and drag with your cursor to aim and launch Phoebe's projectiles at the bullies.

- Use the left and right arrows view the locations of the bullies
